```{r}
install.packages("sf")
install.packages("stars")
install.packages("tmap")
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
library(sf) # for vector data (more soon!)
library(stars) # for raster data (more soon!)
library(tmap) # for static and interactive maps
library(here)
```

# raster of global elevations
world_elevation \<- read_stars(here("data","week1","worldelevation.tif"))

# country boundaries
world_vector \<- read_sf(here("data","week1","worldvector.gpkg"))

# major cities
world_cities \<- read_sf(here("data","week1","worldcities.gpkg"))
